articles.description: Reaction as England defend their European title with a dramatic penalty shootout win over Spain in Switzerland.

articles.description: "This year it was meant for England" - how the Lionesses achieved the greatest feat in the country's footballing history.

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from England vs Spain in the UEFA Women's Euro 2025 final.

articles.description: Ben Stokes will not be told to limit his bowling, but must realise he needs to for the good of his England team, writes Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: England vs India: Ben Stokes will not be told to stop - he must realise it himself, says Jonathan Agnew

articles.description: Chloe Kelly and Hannah Hampton have not had easy journeys to Euro 2025 - now they are heralded as England's heroines.

articles.description: Oscar Piastri's victory in the Belgian Grand Prix underlines the fine margins that will likely decide the world championship battle with his team-mate Lando Norris.

articles.description: England's number one Charley Hull is continuing to do things her way as she looks to break her major duck at the 60th time of asking in Wales this week.

articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Tadej Pogacar seals fourth title

articles.description: Bayern Munich are in talks over a second improved offer in excess of £60m for Liverpool forward Luis Diaz.
articles.title: Luis Diaz: Bayern Munich preparing improved bid for Liverpool forward

articles.description: England defender Lucy Bronze's middle name is Tough, which perfectly encapsulates her Euro 2025 performances as the defender tells BBC Sport she played the whole tournament with a fractured tibia.
articles.title: Lucy Bronze: Lioness defender played entire Euro 2025 tournament with fractured tibia
